assetProfile.address2: 8th Floor Nei Hu Road Neihu District
assetProfile.longBusinessSummary: Progate Group Corporation provides IC design turnkey services worldwide. It offers SOC/ASIC technology turnkey, ASIC implementation platform, multi-project wafer/cybershuttle, gate array turnkey, FPGA to ASIC turnkey, multi-layer mask turnkey, embedded flash turnkey, high voltage turnkey, platform ASIC turnkey, IP design, APR layout, COT/foundry turnkey, system-in-package turnkey, and ASIC/SOC product turnkey service. The company under the design services provides SoC platforms of ARM-core or ANDES-core with peripheral IPs and high-speed interfaces, RTL coding, and system integration; and under the turnkey testing solution and service provides testing program development, chip probing, and IC final testing service. It also offers CPU, digital, mixed signal, special IO, memory, and analog IP services, as well as high speed interface PHY services. The company was founded in 1991 and is headquartered in Taipei, Taiwan.
